data.title: Lorain County Ohio Obituaries
data.text:
Thomas D. Kuns, 68, Enjoyed Gardening & Wildlife

Thomas D. Kuns, age 68, of Lorain, died unexpectedly at his home on Saturday January 2nd, 2010.

Full Obituary

Rosemary Reinhardt, 89, Enjoyed Cooking

Rosemary Reinhardt (nee Italiano), 89 of Vermilion, passed peacefully into God's arms on Thursday, December 31, 2009.

Full Obituary

Robert A. Rushinsky, 44, Enjoyed Fishing & Sports

Robert A. Rushinsky, 44, of Lorain, died Tuesday December 29, 2009 at his home.

Full Obituary

Leo J. ''Joe'' Kastl, 88, WWII Veteran

Leo J. " Joe" Kastl, 88, of Lorain died Monday evening, December 21, 2009 at Community Health Partners Regional Medical Center in Lorain following a prolonged illness.

Full Obituary

Eva Sanchez, 84, Enjoyed Traveling & Gambling Trips

Eva Sanchez (nee Melendez), 84, of Lorain, died Friday December 25, 2009 at Community Regional Medical Center in Lorain.

Full Obituary

Steve C. Demou, 73, Popular Businessman

Steve C. Demou, 73, popular businessman of Vermilion and Lorain, died Monday December 28, 2009 at the Cleveland Clinic following a six-month battle with colon cancer.

Full Obituary

Josiah Zamuel Orona, 16 mth

Josiah Zamuel Orona, 16 month child of Rev. Joel and Juanita (nee Rivera) Orona of Lorain was taken into Jesus' arms, Monday, December 28, 2009, in Community Health Partners Regional Medical Center, Lorain.

Full Obituary

Edward Lee White, 83, Enjoyed Hunting

Edward Lee White, age 83, of Lorain, went home to be with his Lord on Wednesday Dec. 16th, 2009 following an extended illness.

Full Obituary

Thomas W. Toole, 93, Enjoyed Playing his Accordions

Thomas W. Toole, 93, of Elyria died Thursday, December 17, 2009 at New Life Hospice in Lorain following a long illness.

Full Obituary

Albert J. Bozsoki Sr. , 89, Co-Owner of Bozsoki Builders

Albert J. Bozsoki, Sr., 89, of Lorain, died Sunday Dec. 13, 2009 at the home of his son Albert Jr. while under the care of New Life Hospice after a 3-month illness.

Full Obituary

John F. Todarello, 90, Founding Member of I.A.V. Post #1

John F. Todarello, 90, passed away on Sunday, Dec. 13, 2009 at Anchor Lodge Nursing Home, Lorain.

Full Obituary

June N. Varadi, 94, Homemaker

June N. Varadi (nee Logan Myers), 94 of Lorain, died Sunday, Dec. 13, 2009 in Community Health Partners following a short illness.

Full Obituary

Deanna M. Snurr, 71, Enjoyed Painting and Crafts

Deanna M. Snurr, 71 of Lorain died Thursday, Dec. 10, 2009 at New Life Hospice Center at St. Joseph in Lorain following a brief illness.

Full Obituary

Santiago Maldonado, 93, Owned Barber Shop

Santiago Papi Chago Maldonado 93 of Lorain died Thursday, Dec. 10, 2009 in Avon Oaks Caring Community following a lengthy illness.

Full Obituary
